概述  软件包   类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

com.upeng.commons.lang.builder
类 ToJSONStringBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.upeng.commons.lang.builder.ToJSONStringBuilder

public class ToJSONStringBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

For return stander JSON string

Key can not be null

public static void main(String[] args){ testNoNameEmpty(); testWithNameEmpty(); ToJSONStringBuilder builder = new ToJSONStringBuilder(); builder.append("nickName", null); builder.append("icon", "http://www.unclepeng.com/a.jpg"); builder.append(null, "fcde"); builder.append("state", 3); builder.append(null, 6.0); ToJSONStringBuilder builder2 = new ToJSONStringBuilder("res"); String[] strs = new String[]{"12","35","42"}; builder2.appendArray("tt3", strs, false); builder2.append("a",1); builder2.append("a2","test"); builder2.append("a3",null); builder.append(builder2); System.out.println(builder2); System.out.println(builder); } public static void testNoNameEmpty(){ ToJSONStringBuilder builder = new ToJSONStringBuilder(); System.out.println(builder.toString()); } public static void testWithNameEmpty(){ ToJSONStringBuilder builder = new ToJSONStringBuilder("test"); System.out.println(builder.toString()); } result: null "test":null "res":{"tt3":[12,35,42],"a":1,"a2":"test","a3":null}} {"nickName":null,"icon":"http://www.unclepeng.com/a.jpg","fcde","state":3,6.0,"res":{"tt3":[12,35,42],"a":1,"a2":"test","a3":null}}

作者：
Lucky

构造方法详细信息

ToJSONStringBuilder

public ToJSONStringBuilder(java.lang.String name)
etc. "name":{"key1":"value1","intkey1",3}

for null return "name":null

参数：
name -

ToJSONStringBuilder

public ToJSONStringBuilder()
etc. {"key1":"value1","intkey1",3}

for null return null

方法详细信息

append

public ToJSONStringBuilder append(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                  java.lang.String value)
Append fieldName & String value

参数：
fieldName - key
value - value
返回：

append

public ToJSONStringBuilder append(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                  java.lang.String value,
                                  boolean isForStringValue)
append("name","value",true) -> "name":"value"

append("name","value",false) -> "name":value

参数：
fieldName - key
value - value
isForStringValue - if true, add \" between value
返回：

append
